try to get pregnant.
• Talk to your GP or a 
healthcare professional if 
you have any concerns or 
need support.

6
• As soon as you know you are 
pregnant, get in touch with a 
midwife or your GP to organise 
your antenatal care (see 
Antenatal care on page 55). 
Begin to think about where you 
want your baby to be born (see 
page	61).	A	leaflet	outlining	your	
choices is available from your 
midwife and GP.
